title: 4.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Write a program to convert the temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius using a user-defi ned function. You have to ask the user to enter the temperature in Fahrenheit and convert it to Celsius. The conversion formula from Fahrenheit to
Celsius is:
C = (F-32)/1.8
Here F indicates the value of the temperature in Fahrenheit and C indicates the value of the temperature in Celsius.
Do the reverse using another function and let the user choose which value to convert
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
